name: PandaEar Baby Pacifier Clips, 6 Pack Universal Holder Leash for Boys and Girls, Teething Toys Teethers
short_description: UNIVERSAL CLIP-The strap is a universal pacifier leash designed with a loop to be compatible with all types of pacifiers. It can hold soother, burp cloths, teething rings, baby blankets, and drool bibs
PREMIUM QUALITY CLASP- Our strap features a strong and heavy duty premium quality clasp that won’t fall off while remaining gentle on your baby’s clothes

SHORT STRAP- Our clip is ultimately made shorter for both safety and sanitary reasons. Not only do shorter clips eliminate the risk of strangulation, but also it helps a crawling baby keep their pacifier from dragging on the dirty ground

SAFETY- The leash is made of one-layer polyester fabric, which is washable, durable, and soft. All PandaEar materials go through rigorous testing. They are free of lead, PVC, BPA, phthalates, latex and other harmful metals and chemicals
EASY TO CLEAN: Designed with convenience in mind, these pacifier clips can be easily cleaned with warm water and soap, ensuring that they stay hygienic for everyday use
product_description: Welcome to PandaEar, At PandaEar everything we do starts with Mom and Baby in mind. As a family run company full of little ones ourselves – we only offer products we trust and use in our own home. Our teether pacifier clips are put under countless tests to ensure they work for baby, they’re fun but most importantly they are SAFE. Features: Prevents pacifiers, teethers and small toys from getting lost! ✅ ✅ Makes a thoughtful baby shower gift ✅ Features a strong clasp that won’t pull off but is gentle on clothes ✅ Works with all types of pacifiers such as Soothie, Avent, Mam and more ✅ Durable and non-toxic ✅ Hand wash and air dry What Are You Waiting For, Order Yours Today!

The bright and colorful pattern will attract your baby's attention and make them look cute while keeping their pacifier close.

They are the universal pacifier clip and fit to your favorite brand of pacifier and soother. Keep your baby's pacifier and pacifier clip within easy reach and prevent them from falling off dirty floors or getting lost.

Premium Quality: Keep your baby's pacifier within reach at all times with LSTRAGY's exclusive design of pacifier clip. Made from high-quality materials, our pacifier holders feature plastic teeth that securely hold the pacifier and are less likely to damage clothes than metal clips. With a comfortable fit, our pacifier clips make it easy for baby to use their pacifier and prevent any discomfort.

Perfect Gift Idea: A thoughtful and well-designed Pacifier Holder for all baby boys and girls. Packed in exquisite gift box, make the pacifier clip a perfect present for baby's shower, birthday or any special occasion. The perfect accessory for your stroller, highchair, car seat, shopping cart. If you are unsatisfied or have any issues, just contact us, and we will take care of everything for you!

name: Luladream Pacifier and Clip Set - Natural Rubber Nipple - Soft Teething Handle - for Infants Baby's and Toddlers, 0-18 Months (Camel + Cream + Clips)
short_description: Soft Silicone Handle: The Luladream pacifier features a patended handle design to provide targeted relief for sore gums, offering a safe and satisfying chewing experience while effectively massaging your baby's tender gums to alleviate discomfort and reduce fussiness

Proven Nipple Shape: The proven nipple shape on this pacifier, crafted by infant specialists is soft and durable, making it ideal for newborns and teething babies. Its thoughtful design promotes healthy oral development, ensuring a smooth transition from breastfeeding to pacifier use.

CPSIA Tested and Compliant: Our pacifiers and teethers were carefully designed with your baby’s health directly in mind. Made of 100% CPSIA tested and compliant materials, for ideal safety and with large vent holes for breathability and to reduce moisture buildup.

Your Purchase Matters: Discover the joy of purposeful shopping at Bleu La La, where your purchase makes a meaningful impact. By choosing our products, you support our mission to help moms struggling with fertility issues by donating 10% of our profits to charities dedicated to bringing the gift of parenthood to those in need.

Care Instructions: Sterilize before use. It is recommended to replace the pacifier every 4 weeks to maintain utmost safety and hygiene. Check pacifier and clip before each use discard with any signs of damage.
product_details: Safety warning ‎Check the nipple before each use. Throw away at first signs of damage or weakness. Always use this product under close adult supervision. For safety and hygiene replace the pacifier after 4 weeks of use. Sterilize before first use. Rinse thoroughly with soap and water before each use. Do not tie pacifier or clips around child's neck as it presents a strangulation risk. Do not attach ribbons or cords through ventilation holes. Do not leave pacifier in direct sunlight, near source of heat, or leave in disinfectant. Use only with pacifier clips that are CPSIA tested and compliant for safety and assurance.
Material Composition ‎Natural rubber, Medical grade silcone

Care instructions ‎Sterilize before use. It is recommended to replace the pacifier every 4 weeks to maintain utmost safety and hygiene. Check pacifier before each use discard with any signs of damage.
